Andy McGuinness

WorkAboutBlog

Hey there, I'm Andy.

I'm a 24-year-old developer currently located inChicago, Illinois. I specialize in full-stack development, from setting up Apache on the server to perfecting CSS animations on the front-end. I have experience in AngularJS, WordPress, CodeIgniter, and SASS, to name a few things.

I constantly seek to learn new things and love new challenges. If I don't know how to do it, I'll figure it out. I'm stubborn like that.

I'm currently the lead developer forPlanetLab, and have been working on that project for close to two years. In addition, I am also a developer withBrandivoandAdvant Interactive, where I work on WordPress sites from plugin development to theme perfection. In my spare time, I work as an expert atBugRex, a site where experts help you solve quick HTML/CSS/JS/WordPress/Rails/etc. issues. I also am working onOsseusJS-- yet another static site generator :)

If you have any questions, or would just like to chat (about anything -- development-related or not), feel free to shoot me an email using my contact form.
